text: Chess at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games took place at the Tagaytay City Convention Center in Tagaytay City, Cavite, Philippines. Chess is not one of the Olympic Games events but is included in the SEAG ==Summary== ==Medal winners== {| class="wikitable" !
